entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. POP 60%
